entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @RepAdamSchiff House stop talking,do something to get piece trash out WH. You have the Constitution that show he’s unfit to be in the WH, some justice system that will  stand with you. All this talk and no actions. We may all be dead from COVID-19 or his murdering cops we wouldn’t need the vote
